channel.description: Recent content in Posts on dadul96 blog

item.title: How to add a Comment Section to your Hugo Papermod Blog using giscus
item.description: A guide on how to set up a comment section in your Hugo PaperMod blog using giscus.

item.title: Mounting a Headlamp on a Mountain Bike
item.description: Mounting a headlamp on a mountain bike using photogrammetry, CAD, 3D printing, and trial & error üòÅ

item.title: STM32 USB HID Mouse Jiggler
item.description: An STM32-based USB HID device to periodically shake your mouse pointer.

item.title: HPL Benchmark on a Raspberry Pi 4B
item.description: A guide on how to run the HPL benchmark on a Raspberry Pi 4B. Various Rasbpian OS versions are used (buster, bullseye, 32-bit, 64-bit) and the results are compared.

item.title: Hugo PaperMod: Custom Home-Info
item.description: A quick guide on how to customize the Home-Info field of the Hugo PaperMod theme.

item.title: Starting and finishing a project or an idea
item.description: A thought collection around the topic of starting and finishing a project or an idea.
